title: Greek National Water Company - Water Management System - Junction
description: An optional text that describes other significant information about the spillway

measuredFrom.description: : A sub-Relationship to the ID of a node (e.g., Junction, Sluice gate, Reservoir) from which the relevant position of the cross section is measured

tag.description: An optional text used to assign the spillway to a category, perhaps one based on age or the served area

spillwayType.description: The type of the spillway (the methods for computing outflow): It defines the type of the spillway. It takes specific values: 'BROAD-CRESTED', 'OGEE', 'SHARP-CRESTED' or 'SPECIFIED SPILLWAY'. In the case of “SPECIFIED SPILLWAY”, only 'elevation (m) – discharge (m3/s)' curve is required

crestElevation.description: The length of the spillway (m) equal to the total length through which water passes.  Required only for 'BROAD-CRESTED', 'OGEE' and 'SHARP-CRESTED'

spillwayWidth.description: The width of the spillway (m). Only for 'BROAD-CRESTED' type

numberAbutments.description: The number of abutments of an ogee spillway. Only for 'Ogee' type

apronElevation.description: The elevation at the bottom of the ogee spillway structure (P, just upstream of the spillway)

apronLength.description: The total length of the spillway bottom (m)

dischargeCoefficient.description: the discharge coefficient (m0.5/s) accounts for energy losses as water enters the spillway, flows through the spillway, and eventually exits the spillway

designHead.description: The design head is the total upstream energy head, measured above the spillway crest, for which the spillway is designed (Ho) for 'Ogee Spillway'

designDischargeCoefficient.description: The discharge coefficient (Co) for the design discharge (Ho)

maxFloodElevation.description: The maximum elevation of water that can passes the spillway

waterDischarge.description: the discharge that passes the spillway (Q)

upstreamVelocity.description: The flow velocity upstream of the spillway

upstreamDepth.description: The water depth upstream of the spillway, above the crest (H)

abutmentType.description: The type of abutments of an ogee spillway. Restricted values to 'Concrete' or 'Earth'.  Only for 'Ogee' type

curveElevationDischarge.description: A relationship to the ID label of the curve that represents the elevation as a function of discharge

curveDischargeCoefficient.description: A relationship to the ID label of the curve that represents the discharge coefficient as a function of upstream head/depth and spillway geometry. For 'BROAD-CRESTED', discharge coefficient as a function of upstream head over spillway width. For 'OGEE', C/Co over H/Ho

curveDesignDischargeCoefficient.description: A relationship to the ID label of the curve that represents the design discharge coefficient as a function of apron Elevation over design upstream head. Only for 'OGEE' (Co over P/ Ho)
